page.title: 02HOUSES IN HAXBY
page.content: { There are a lot of new estates around Haxby.There used to be a large old house called Eastfield House but it was pulled down and now a lot of new houses are being built in its place. I live in a detached house, it is about 7 years old. It has 3 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, 1 living room, 1 kitchen and a dining room.Since we moved in all the rooms have been redecorated. We used to have a long dining and living room together but now we have an extension to our garage and we have a breakfast bar. We have lived in our house about 5 years before that we lived in a block of town houses.
